sections.heading: Animal control officers; appointment; authority; regulation of dogs; powers and duties9-499
sections.text: 04.Animal control officers; appointment; authority; regulation of dogs; powers and dutiesA. Any city and town may by ordinance provide for the appointment of animal control officers who may commence an action
